description: ISO 639-1 is the first part of the ISO 639 international-standard language-code family.  ISO 639-1 provides two-character lowercase alphabetic strings that serve as identifiers of languages.  The list contains approximately 180 discrete codes.  All ISO 639-1 languages also have ISO 639-2 three-character code representations.  These codes are linked to codes for the same languages in ISO 639-2 and the MARC Language Codes.
name: ISO 639-1: Codes for the Representation of Names of Languages â€• Part 1: Two-letter codes for languages
